title: Hypervideo-Based Language Instruction Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language education theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers to develop hypervideo production and utilization skills needed when transitioning to actual classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can design hypervideo interactive features (branching, navigation, expansion) for language education contexts
Learners can develop hypervideo-based lesson scenarios reflecting cognitive and sociocognitive theories
Learners can produce hypervideo content applicable to real language education settings through project-based learning
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
